sensorthings.extensions.dataarray.engine module

class sensorthings.extensions.dataarray.engine.DataArrayBaseEngine

Bases: object

convert_to_data_array(response, select=None)

Convert Observations response to a data array.

Parameters: - response (dict): The response dictionary. - select (Union[str, None]): Optional parameter to select specific fields.

Returns: - dict: The converted data array response.

abstract create_observations(component, entity_body)

Create Observations using data array format.

Parameters: - component (Type[‘BaseComponent’]): The type of component. - entity_body (‘BasePostBody’): The entity body.

Returns: - List[str]: The list of observation IDs.

Return type:

List[str]
